item.title: Why The Thousand Brains Theory Could Hold The Key To True AGI
item.description: Despite advancements, AI has yet to achieve continuous, lifelong learning and the ability to generalize from experience.

item.title: AI Depends On Your Precious Data: Don't Lose Control Over It
